Class.Name: MessageQueue
Class.Description: Implemention of an in-memory message queue for inter-process communication

Function.Name: pump
Function.Description: Pumps pending messages at a given throttle rate

Function.Name: pump_node
Function.Description: Pumps pending messages on a node at a given throttle rate

Function.Name: subscribe
Function.Description: Subscribes to messages at a path

Function.Name: route
Function.Description: Sets up a route to a destination queue

Function.Name: unroute
Function.Description: Unroutes a from a route path

Function.Name: unsubscribe
Function.Description: Unsubscribes a listener from a queue

Function.Name: clear
Function.Description: Purges all messages from a queue

Function.Name: pop
Function.Description: Pops the next available message from a queue, None if empty

Function.Name: push
Function.Description: Pushs a message to a queue

Function.Name: empty
Function.Description: Checks if a queue is empty

Function.Name: count
Function.Description: Returns the number of messages pending in a queue

Function.Name: find
Function.Description: Locates a set of queues with a property

Function.Name: dump
Function.Description: Dumps a list of all queues with a particular prefix
